Title: Enacts the "New York Business Emergency Relief Act of 2025"
Summary: Enacts the "New York Business Emergency Relief Act"; directs the governor to use unallocated settlement funds reserved in the economic uncertainties, and any further settlement money received by the state or state surplus funds to pay the debt to the federal unemployment insurance trust fund.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to enacting the "New York Business Emergency Relief Act of 2025"
